Отличная игра с интересными головоломками, отличным ко-опом и неплохим сюжетом. 8 лет игре, а все еще хочется её пройти заново и поиграть с друзьями. Супер!
Нот бед
playing co op with your friends unlocks a deep, intense level of bastard. you will not know peace playing co op.

Portal.
One of the best selling Valve games, that is not only my opinion. 
Just look at the top 10 best sold Valve sold games.
Portal is just a timeless game, you don't actually need to learn English to understand what is going on around you.
And the story telling.. Oh my god, it's gold. Just Portal 1 and 2, in general is my top played games, so fromm my side, 10/10 and a golden star to the makers. Signed by me: Bissen03
神作是有理由的

Portal 2 is a fantastic game.  It takes the fun puzzles and silly setting of the first game and dials it up to 11 with this game.  The game is a blast, the story is outstanding, and the game play is fluid.  BUY THIS GAME!!!

Portal has been always an unique piece of puzzle, humors and odd robot dialogue. Some are complicated and some aren't, but it's still much more enjoyable than the first one. Recommended this to you who loves Portal, Half-Life (with Puzzle) and Workshop modders that enjoyed this type of game.

Builds well on the first game, great plot twists, wonderfully sarcastic dialogue, and the multiplayer mode could be a game by its self. 
10/10 will continue to play again, and did I mention the physics puzzles?
